Verses: 1 saamuvel Ennum Pillaiyaantaan Elikku Munpaakak Karththarukkup Panivitai Seydhukontirundhaan; Annaatkalile Karththarutaiya Vasanam Apoorvamaayirundhadhu; Piraththiyatchamaana Tharisanam Irundhadhillai.
2 orunaal Eli Thannutaiya Sdhaanaththile Patuththukkontirundhaan; Avan Paarkkak Kootaadhapatikku Avanutaiya Kankal Irulataindhirundhadhu.
3 thevanutaiya Petti Irukkira Karththarutaiya Aalayaththil Thevanutaiya Vilakku Anaindhupokumunne Saamuvelum Patuththukkontirundhaan.
4 appozhudhu Karththar, Saamuvelaik Kooppittaar. Adharku Avan: Idho, Irukkiren Endru Solli,
5 eliyinitaththil Oti, Idho, Irukkiren; Ennaik Kooppitteere Endraan. Adharku Avan: Naan Kooppitavillai, Thirumpippoip Patuththukkol Endraan; Avan Poippatuththukkontaan.

6 marupatiyum Karththar Saamuvele Endru Kooppittaar; Appozhudhu Saamuvel Ezhundhirundhu Eliyinitaththil Poi: Idho, Irukkiren; Ennaik Kooppitteere Endraan. Adharku Avan: En Makane, Naan Unnaik Kooppitavillai. Thirumpippoip Patuththukkol Endraan.
7 saamuvel Karththarai Innum Ariyaadhirundhaan; Karththarutaiya Vaarththai Avanukku Innum Velippatavillai.

8 karththar Marupatiyum Moondraamvisai: Saamuvele Endru Kooppittaar. Avan Ezhundhirundhu Eliyinitaththil Poi, Idho, Irukkiren; Ennaik Kooppitteere Endraan. Appozhudhu Karththar Pillaiyaantaanaik Kooppitukiraar Endru Eli Arindhu,
9 saamuvelai Nokki: Nee Poippatuththukkol; Unnaik Kooppittaal, Appozhudhu Nee: Karththaave Sollum; Atiyen Ketkiren Endru Sol Endraan; Saamuvel Poi, Thannutaiya Sdhaanaththile Patuththukkontaan.
10 appozhudhu Karththar Vandhu Nindru, Munpola: Saamuvele Saamuvele Endru Kooppittaar; Adharkuch Chaamuvel: Sollum; Atiyen Ketkiren Endraan.
11 karththar Saamuvelai Nokki: Idho, Naan Isravelil Oru Kaariyaththaich Cheyven; Adhaik Ketkira Ovvoruvanutaiya Irantu Kaadhukalilum Adhu Thoniththukkontirukkum.
12 naan Eliyin Kutumpaththirku Virodhamaakach Chonna Yaavaiyum, Avanmel Annaalile Varappannuven; Adhaith Thotangavum Adhai Mutikkavum Pokiren.

13 avan Kumaarar Thangalmel Saapaththai Varappannukiradhai Avan Arindhirundhum, Avarkalai Atakkaamarpona Paavaththinimiththam, Naan Avan Kutumpaththukku Endrum Neengaadha Niyaayaththeerppuch Cheyven Endru Avanukku Ariviththen.
14 adhinimiththam Eliyin Kutumpaththaar Seydha Akkiramam Orupodhum Paliyinaalaavadhu Kaanikkaiyinaalaavadhu Nivirththiyaavadhillai Endru Eliyin Kutumpaththaikkuriththu Aanaiyittirukkiren Endraar.
15 saamuvel Vitiyarkaalamattum Patuththirundhu, Karththarutaiya Aalayaththin Kadhavukalaith Thirandhaan; Saamuvel Elikku Andhath Tharisanaththai Arivikkap Payandhaan.
16 eliyo: Saamuvele, En Makane Endru Saamuvelaik Kooppittaan. Avan: Idho, Irukkiren Endraan.

17 appozhudhu Avan: Karththar Unnitaththil Sonna Kaariyam Enna? Enakku Adhai Maraikkaventaam; Avar Unnitaththil Sonna Sakala Kaariyaththilum Yaadhondrai Enakku Maraiththaayaanaal, Thevan Unakku Adharkuch Chariyaakavum Adharku Adhikamaakavum Seyvaaraaka Endraan.
18 appozhudhu Saamuvel Ondraiyum Avanukku Maraikkaamal, Andhak Kaariyangalaiyellaam Avanukku Ariviththaan. Adharku Avan: Avar Karththar; Avar Thamadhu Paarvaikku Nalamaanadhaich Cheyvaaraaka Endraan.
19 saamuvel Valarndhaan; Karththar Avanutanekoota Irundhaar; Avar Thammutaiya Ellaa Vaarththaikalilum Ondraiyaakilum Tharaiyile Vizhundhu Pokavitavillai.
20 saamuvel Karththarutaiya Theerkkadharisidhaan Endru Thaanmudhal Peyersepaamattumulla Sakala Isravelarukkum Vilanginadhu.
21 karththar Pinnum Seelovile Tharisanam Thandharulinaar; Karththar Seelovile Thammutaiya Vaarththaiyinaale Saamuvelukkuth Thammai Velippatuththinaar.
